languages.text: Культ рос и набирал последователей среди рабочих и бедняков, даже смог просочиться в могучие торговые гильдии. Однако все пошло не так, когда Поцелуй генокрада был дарован негодному кандидату. Эта оплошность привела к раскрытию культа и кровавой чистке. Автор дневника с ужасом и скорбью вспоминает, сколько чистокровных детей Звездного спасителя сгинуло в резне.

The cult grew and gained followers among the workers and the poor, and even managed to infiltrate powerful trade guilds. However, their plans fell apart when the Genestealer's Kiss was granted to an unworthy candidate. This oversight led to the discovery of the cult and a bloody purge. The author of the diary recalls with horror and sorrow how many of the pureblood children of the Star Saviour perished in the massacre.
languages.original_text: Культ рос и набирал последователей среди рабочих и бедняков, даже смог просочиться в могучие торговые гильдии. Однако все пошло не так, когда Поцелуй генокрада был дарован негодному кандидату. Эта оплошность привела к раскрытию культа и кровавой чистке. Автор дневника с ужасом и скорбью вспоминает, сколько чистокровных детей Звездного спасителя сгинуло в резне.

The author of the diary recalls how many of the pureblood children of the Star Saviour perished in the massacre with horror and sorrow.

However, their plans fell apart when the Genestealer's Kiss was granted to an unworthy candidate. This oversight led to the discovery of the cult and a bloody purge. languages.text: El culto creció y encontró seguidores entre los trabajadores y los pobres, e incluso logró infiltrarse en poderosos gremios comerciales. Sin embargo, sus planes se desbarataron cuando un candidato indigno recibió el Beso del Genestealer. Este error condujo al descubrimiento del culto y su consecuente purga. El autor del diario recuerda con horror y pesar cuántos hijos de pura sangre del Salvador de las Estrellas perdieron la vida en esta masacre.
languages.original_text: The cult grew and gained followers among the workers and the poor, and even managed to infiltrate powerful trade guilds. However, their plans fell apart when the Genestealer's Kiss was granted to an unworthy candidate. This oversight led to the discovery of the cult and a bloody purge. The author of the diary recalls with horror and sorrow how many of the pureblood children of the Star Saviour perished in the massacre.

traits.locale_text: El culto creció y encontró seguidores entre los trabajadores y los pobres, e incluso logró infiltrarse en poderosos gremios comerciales. Sin embargo, sus planes se desbarataron cuando un candidato indigno recibió el Beso del Genestealer. Este error condujo al descubrimiento del culto y su consecuente purga. El autor del diario recuerda con horror y pesar cuántos hijos de pura sangre del Salvador de las Estrellas perdieron la vida en esta masacre.

languages.text: 教団は成長し、労働者や貧しい人々の間で信者を獲得した。さらに強力な貿易ギルドにまで潜入することさえできた。しかし、ジーンスティーラーの口づけがふさわしくない候補者に与えられたことで、彼らの計画は頓挫してしまった。これがきっかけで、カルト教団の発覚と流血の粛清につながった。この日記の著者は、星の救世主の純血の子供たちが大虐殺で死んだことの、恐怖と悲しみについて書いていた。
languages.original_text: The cult grew and gained followers among the workers and the poor, and even managed to infiltrate powerful trade guilds. However, their plans fell apart when the Genestealer's Kiss was granted to an unworthy candidate. This oversight led to the discovery of the cult and a bloody purge. The author of the diary recalls with horror and sorrow how many of the pureblood children of the Star Saviour perished in the massacre.

traits.locale_text: 教団は成長し、労働者や貧しい人々の間で信者を獲得した。さらに強力な貿易ギルドにまで潜入することさえできた。しかし、ジーンスティーラーの口づけがふさわしくない候補者に与えられたことで、彼らの計画は頓挫してしまった。これがきっかけで、カルト教団の発覚と流血の粛清につながった。この日記の著者は、星の救世主の純血の子供たちが大虐殺で死んだことの、恐怖と悲しみについて書いていた。

languages.text: 这支教派规模不断壮大，在工人与穷人之中获得了许多追随者，甚至成功地渗透到了影响力强大的贸易公会中。然而，当基因窃取者之吻被赐予某位不称职的候选人时，教派的计划暴露了。由于教团的疏忽，教派的存在被帝国当局发现，随后爆发了一场血腥的清洗行动。在记录这段内容的时候，日记作者的笔触中充满了恐惧与悲伤，记录了在这场大屠杀中丧生的纯血子嗣的数量。
languages.original_text: The cult grew and gained followers among the workers and the poor, and even managed to infiltrate powerful trade guilds. However, their plans fell apart when the Genestealer's Kiss was granted to an unworthy candidate. This oversight led to the discovery of the cult and a bloody purge. The author of the diary recalls with horror and sorrow how many of the pureblood children of the Star Saviour perished in the massacre.

traits.locale_text: 这支教派规模不断壮大，在工人与穷人之中获得了许多追随者，甚至成功地渗透到了影响力强大的贸易公会中。然而，当基因窃取者之吻被赐予某位不称职的候选人时，教派的计划暴露了。由于教团的疏忽，教派的存在被帝国当局发现，随后爆发了一场血腥的清洗行动。在记录这段内容的时候，日记作者的笔触中充满了恐惧与悲伤，记录了在这场大屠杀中丧生的纯血子嗣的数量。

languages.text: Der Kult wuchs und gewann Anhänger unter den Arbeitern und den Armen, konnte sogar mächtige Handelsgilden unterwandern. Doch seine Pläne scheiterten, als der Symbiontenkuss einem unwürdigen Kandidaten zugestanden wurde. Durch diese Fehlentscheidung wurde der Kult entdeckt und in einer blutigen Aktion ausgelöscht. Der Autor des Tagebuchs erinnert sich voller Schrecken und Trauer daran, wie viele reinblütige Kinder der Sternenretter bei dem Massaker umkamen.
languages.original_text: The cult grew and gained followers among the workers and the poor, and even managed to infiltrate powerful trade guilds. However, their plans fell apart when the Genestealer's Kiss was granted to an unworthy candidate. This oversight led to the discovery of the cult and a bloody purge. The author of the diary recalls with horror and sorrow how many of the pureblood children of the Star Saviour perished in the massacre.

traits.locale_text: Der Kult wuchs und gewann Anhänger unter den Arbeitern und den Armen, konnte sogar mächtige Handelsgilden unterwandern. Doch seine Pläne scheiterten, als der Symbiontenkuss einem unwürdigen Kandidaten zugestanden wurde. Durch diese Fehlentscheidung wurde der Kult entdeckt und in einer blutigen Aktion ausgelöscht. Der Autor des Tagebuchs erinnert sich voller Schrecken und Trauer daran, wie viele reinblütige Kinder der Sternenretter bei dem Massaker umkamen.

languages.text: Le culte a pris de l'ampleur et commencé par faire des adeptes parmi les ouvriers et les démunis, avant de noyauter les puissantes guildes marchandes. Pour autant, ses plans sont tombés à l'eau lorsque le baiser du Genestealer a été accordé à un candidat indigne. Une erreur fatale qui a valu à la secte d'être découverte et de faire l'objet d'une purge sanglante. L'auteur du journal se rappelle avec tristesse et horreur les nombreux enfants du Sauveur astral au sang pur ayant péri au cours du massacre.
languages.original_text: The cult grew and gained followers among the workers and the poor, and even managed to infiltrate powerful trade guilds. However, their plans fell apart when the Genestealer's Kiss was granted to an unworthy candidate. This oversight led to the discovery of the cult and a bloody purge. The author of the diary recalls with horror and sorrow how many of the pureblood children of the Star Saviour perished in the massacre.

Une erreur fatale qui a valu à la secte d'être découverte et de faire l'objet d'une purge sanglante. languages.text: Tarikat büyüdükçe işçiler ve yoksullar arasından müritler kazanmış. Hatta güçlü ticaret loncalarına sızmayı bile başarmış. Ancak Gençalan'ın Busesi, değersiz bir adaya bahşedildiğinde planları suya düşmüş. Bu hata, tarikatın keşfedilmesine ve ardından kan revan içinde bir tasfiyeye yol açmış. Günlüğün yazarı, Yıldız Halaskârı'nın safkan çocuklarından kaçının bu katliamda can verdiğini dehşet ve kederle anımsıyor.
languages.original_text: The cult grew and gained followers among the workers and the poor, and even managed to infiltrate powerful trade guilds. However, their plans fell apart when the Genestealer's Kiss was granted to an unworthy candidate. This oversight led to the discovery of the cult and a bloody purge. The author of the diary recalls with horror and sorrow how many of the pureblood children of the Star Saviour perished in the massacre.
